review: Absolutely LOVE this thing.  Set up was a breeze and it made my "not smart" TV into a Smart TV with an easy to use interface, great speed, clear picture, and the convenience of being able to control things from either the included remote, or my smartphone app.  I really regret recently spending the extra bucks for a Smart TV in the other room.  I could have saved $100 on the TV and just bought an extra Fire TV Stick.  Am already thinking about buying another for the dumb TV in front of the treadmill.
